name: 2D MC PvP Speedrun
description:
The most popular Minecraft PvP games, (Boxing, Sumo, NoDebuff, and 1.16 PvP), in 2D form. You can also speedrun this! Check out the attached text file for info on that. 

I take 100% full credit for the games and everything in them, except for the sound effects which I got from YouTube.

Here's a little sample playthrough of a Easy Axe run: https://streamable.com/tyb4x3

Discord Server: https://discord.gg/KAzgrDPPyX
